product_name: REI Snowy Creek Fleece Mittens - Toddlers'
long_description: The REI Snowy Creek fleece mittens are made of soft polyester fleece to keep toddlers' fingers warm during fall and winter outings. Fleece dries quickly and provides light insulates even when wet. Soft polyester lining is soft and comfortable. Elastic and cinch straps at wrists help seal in warmth.
